name: cardinality
description: Return the size of the map (or the number of entries in the map).

name: map
description: Creates a map from a set of keys and values.

name: map_entries
description: Returns the map entries as a list of keys/values

name: map_extract
description: Return a list containing the value for a given key or an empty list if the key is not contained in the map. The type of the key provided in the second parameter must match the type of the mapâ€™s keys else an error is returned.

name: map_from_entries
description: Returns a map created from the entries of the array

name: map_keys
description: Returns the keys of a map as a list

name: map_values
description: Returns the values of a map as a list
